name: Amazing Discoveries In Outer Space
description:
An odyssey through the galaxy where physics-based space-flight and platforming action blend seamlessly together. Explore a colorful universe filled with amazing discoveries, alien races, and fashionable hats. Unfortunately, your only company is ZING, a navigation computer with no memory of your whereabouts and a slightly faulty social circuit.

- Rougelike elements
- No weapons or killing (though horrible accidents may occur)
- Procedurally generated worlds
- Newtonian spaceflight with the ship and platformer gameplay with the astronaut
- Unique gameplay built around exploration and physics
- Hand-drawn art and handcrafted game engine
- Comprehensive physical simulation of entire solar systems



Additional hardware required for Remote Play.

1 player
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output
